title: One for All - Trist
body: In one for all, I was wondering if anyone know's if multiple Trist can stack her "E" on a tower or other champ, or is it the 1st trist to get her "E" off gets it.  Also does aa from other Trist help get the damage boosted from her "E"?

replies.body: It's not one for all if you didn't have everyone do the Bandle Gunner march song in mid lane.

Well, I suppose there goes the chance to instantly stack 4 bombs on a turret in 1 second, BUT. If you could coordinate well with 4 other trists, you could still do it in about 5 seconds. Trist #1 bombs, all AA, Trist #2 bombs, all AA, Trist #3 bombs, all AA, etc. I wanna see how fast that turret goes down. But then again, all Naysus trinity force is probably faster, if we're gonna go there.

I went up against an all Tristana team.
The auto attacks from other Tristanas do trigger the damage boost from the E, an I THINK you can stack her E on a turret.

> [{quoted}](name=Princess Emma,realm=NA,application-id=LFfTlAky,discussion-id=QQiTRJ3g,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-10-20T06:29:56.682+0000)
>
> I went up against an all Tristana team.
> The auto attacks from other Tristanas do trigger the damage boost from the E, an I THINK you can stack her E on a turret.

That begs question #2: So, if you CAN stack e's on turrets, does a single auto from one trist boost the damage of all E's currently on the tower?
Because the e cannot stack that isn't a possibility, just to make sure it's clear.

This comes from actually playing trist in one for all (against darius btw). 

Her e does not stack ontop of each other, instead an additional e will detonate the previous one instantly and continue as usual (its the same for whatever target it's used on e.g. turrets).

Also any aa from a trist asists in the e stacks of another trists e (I'm referring to the damage stack) .
